snippet: With the aid of Nathan's annual Hot Dog Eating Contest, the Brooklyn Nets and guard MarShon Brooks took to Coney Island on Wednesday afternoon to continue rebranding the franchise.
abstract: With the aid of Nathan's annual Hot Dog Eating Contest, the Brooklyn Nets and guard MarShon Brooks took to Coney Island on Wednesday afternoon to continue rebranding the franchise.

headline.main: A Day for Hot Dogs (and Nets Basketball)
